definition: abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)

pinyin: A1 er3 ba1 ni2 ya4 ren2

sentences.english: The meeting is disrupted by Albanian irredentist.
sentences.chinese: 會議被阿爾巴尼亞的領土收復主義者所中斷。

sentences.english: Albania was on the verge of turning into another Cuba or North Korea.
sentences.chinese: 阿爾巴尼亞處於轉變成另一個古巴或北朝鮮的邊緣。

sentences.english: 1912 - Albania declares its independence from the Ottoman Empire.
sentences.chinese: 1912年，阿爾巴尼亞宣佈脫離土耳其帝國獨立。

sentences.english: Macchiato is the dominant type of coffee consumed in Albania.
sentences.chinese: 瑪奇朵咖啡起源於阿爾巴尼亞。

sentences.english: Albania in the Balkans in South-Eastern Europe the West Bank.
sentences.chinese: 阿爾巴尼亞位於東南歐巴爾幹半島西岸。

sentences.english: During the visit, I will specially extend an invitation to Albanian journalists to visit China.
sentences.chinese: 此次訪問中，我將專門提出邀請阿爾巴尼亞記者訪華。

sentences.english: According to reports, the incident of mine is a wholly-owned Austrian company Albanian chrome ore.
sentences.chinese: 據報道，事發礦是奧地利全資的阿爾巴尼亞鉻礦公司。

sentences.english: Albanian popular music (këngë popullore) is generally based on Italian models.
sentences.chinese: 阿爾巴尼亞流行歌曲主要是沿襲意大利的模式。

sentences.english: I now spend more than half of my time in Albania.
sentences.chinese: 我現在一多半的時候都是在阿爾巴尼亞度過的。

sentences.english: Do you spend much time in Albania now?
sentences.chinese: 你現在在阿爾巴尼亞呆許多時間嗎？

sentences.english: What do you see happening in Albanian literature today?
sentences.chinese: 您覺得今天的阿爾巴尼亞的文學怎樣？

definition: Yekaterinburg (Russian city, also known as Ekaterinburg or Sverdlovsk)

pinyin: A1 la1 bo2 Lian2 he2 Qiu2 zhang3 guo2
Gang1 guo3 Min2 zhu3 Gong4 he2 guo2
